        public void placeDice(java.lang.String playerName,
                      int diceIndex,
                      java.awt.Point point)
        Perform the action to place a dice, without checking any condition
        Parameters:
        playerName - the players that perform the action
        diceIndex - index of the dice in diceholder
        point - where to put the dice in the Schema
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the cell is already taken

      • increaseDecreaseDice

        public void increaseDecreaseDice(int diceIndex,
                                 int direction)
        Increases or decreases a dice value
        Parameters:
        diceIndex - the index of the dice in the DraftBoard
        direction - 1 to increase, -1 to decrease
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if diceIndex is not equal to -1 and direction is not equal to -1
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if increasing a 6 dice or decreasing a 1 dice

        Parameters:
        draftIndex - index of the dice in the DraftBoard
        turn - the turn from wich swap the dice
        turnDiceIndex - the index in the turn of the dice to swipe

      • changeDiceNumber

        public void changeDiceNumber(int index,
                             int number)
        Change the number of a dice to a specific number
        Parameters:
        index - index of the dice in the DraftBoard to change
        number - new value to assign to the dice. Must be between 1 and 6.
